Case Study

Ascent

The team wanted to experiment with Full Site Editing and TailwindCSS for future projects.

Visit live site

Challenge

What they needed

The team wanted to experiment with Full Site Editing and TailwindCSS for future projects.

Approach

How we solved it

Led implementation of their first FSE theme, integrating Tailwind and reusable components with custom jQuery enhancements.

Completed
